definitions.definition: The raised edge between the pavement and the roadway , typically made of concrete though originally consisting of a line of kerbstones .
A stone ring built to enclose and sometimes revet the cairn or barrow built over a chamber tomb.
Alternative form of curb ( “ raised margin along the edge of a well, etc. ” ) .

main_definition: ( British , Australia , New Zealand ) The raised edge between the pavement and the roadway , typically made of concrete though originally consisting of a line of kerbstones .
secondary_definitions: A stone ring built to enclose and sometimes revet the cairn or barrow built over a chamber tomb.
Alternative form of curb ( “ raised margin along the edge of a well, etc. ” ) .
